title: Paris 1898 in color, street scene [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and applied face restoration and created a sound design for this video of Street Scenes in Paris 1898, An exceptional look at traffic on the streets of the Champs-Élysées in the 19th century, before the arrival of the automobile in the 20th century, with a scene from the avenue du Bois de Boulogne showing the style of dress of the period.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 
✔ Face Restoration

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: Filmoteca Española
